bugreport.Summary: Site layout on the first page is not recommended with layout placement
bugreport.Actual: The layout of the site on the first page does not match the layout of the application. More than 5 pixel spacing
bugreport.Expected: The layout of the site on the first page matches the layout when overlaying. Run up to 5 pixels

Steps.step2: Install and open PerfectPixel browser plugin
Steps.step3: Drag the layout of the first page of the site in jpg format into the plugin window
Steps.step4: Set the parameters in the plugin x=1, y=1, scale=0.24
Steps.step5: Apply a layout layer to the layout of the site according to the edges of the main block
Steps.step6: Hold down Shift + use arrow keys to change position by 10px
